document_data.name: ''Gem of Clarata''
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gem of Clarata''' was a mysterious gem of legendary power. Reputedly, it could grant its user the powers of ''[[healing]]'', ''[[inter-planar travel]]'', ''[[far-seeing]]'', and ''[[telepathy]]'', among many others. As of [[1368 DR]], it was believed to be possessed by [[Tiatha Hawksong]] in [[Leuthilspar]] on [[Evermeet]].
